articles.author: Ellen Francis
articles.title: Trump’s Greenland crusade pushes European allies to a breaking point - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s ultimatum — give up Greenland or face a trade war — has convinced some European officials that retaliation, rather than conciliation, is the answer.
articles.content: BRUSSELS After a year of European leaders trying to charm President Donald Trump with flattery and dealmaking lucrative promises to purchase U.S. goods, including weapons, visits with royals and gift… [+204 chars]
